paper_title: Uncertainty-aware phase prediction of RMPEAs via mixture density networks

claims.claim: The trained MDN model predicts a bimodal distribution for the BCC phase fraction of Ti0.32Al0.26V0.19Nb0.11Co0.12 at 974 K, with a mean of 0.95 and a standard deviation of 0.05
instruction: The code loads the trained MDN model, predicts the BCC phase-fraction distribution for the specified alloy sample, generates the corresponding mixture-distribution plot, and prints the computed mean and standard deviation
Verify that the plotted distribution exhibits two distinct peaks (bimodal) and confirm that the printed mean is 0.95 and the standard deviation is 0.0.
